text: niscayanga, tamaku tamu (tama atmalaku) an'yayam cesukuntu unde vari pranalanu tise devadutalu varito: "Miru e sthitilo undevaru?" Ani adigite, varu: "Memu bhumilo balahinulamuga, nis'sahayulamuga undevaramu!" Ani javabistaru. Daniki (devadutalu): "Emi? Miru valasa povataniki allah bhumi visalanga lekundena?" Ani adugutaru. Ilanti vari saranam narakame. Mariyu adi enta cedda gamyasthanam
